 Kali::
Kali laughted as if she had heard a joke "Cowards won't survive in Predacon's world"said Kali"and neither in BlackFortress... Under the command of Darkfate you can be fool... but not coward... That's true as my name is Kali "Kali did a smile she knew that she had lost the bot but she liked to stay one second more, she knew that Azure was using diplomatic methods, that meant that she would be safe at least while she dind't pressed so much"So, Maximal,  did you went to Pred's territory, didn't you????? that's very brave; I should admit it, not all bots would do that... why did you go, anyway???"
  HanaKirei85@... wrote: AzureBlade: And who might you be, lady? You know it is unsafe to 
travel alone in this forest. There are many wolves, and legends even 
speak of a dreadful dragon. You should be more careful.Mistra was more than a little relieved to know Azure was here. Being by herself wouldn't have done her a bit of good in this situation...she didn't trust this supposed Predicon as far as she could throw her. Although the bot had been awfully quiet...maybe she was planning to give up..? 

Still, it was best to keep her guard up. Her eyes flickered to Azure for a split second, wondering just how much longer this tense scene was going to go on. 

"He's right...caution is best if you value your health." Mistra added.
